title: Parametric Code Generator (CAD -- DRAW)
brief: feature_translator.py, code_gen.py; auto-generated CadQuery scripts from extracted feature trees with full parameterization.

phases.title: Parametric Code Generator (CAD -- DRAW)
phases.description: Build feature-to-CadQuery translator, parametric template generator, code assembler, and code validator. Generate CadQuery code from extracted feature trees with full parameterization and provenance.

units.title: Parametric Code Generator (CAD -- DRAW)
entry_conditions: CC-MS2 complete (extraction engine produces feature trees)
exit_conditions: Feature translator handles all schema operation types
3+ test parts generate valid CadQuery code from extracted feature trees
All dimensions fully parameterized with named parameters, types, ranges, and units
Provenance linked from generated code back to source video/timestamp
Edge cases handled: revolved features, patterns, mirror, multi-body, assemblies
units.rollback: git checkout -- cad-engine/src/feature_translator.py cad-engine/src/code_gen.py cad-engine/src/param_template.py cad-engine/src/code_validator.py

steps.instruction: Build feature-to-CadQuery translator (feature_translator.py): map each operation type from knowledge schema to CadQuery API calls (extrude->Workplane.extrude, revolve->Workplane.revolve, etc.)
Build parametric template generator: convert extracted dimensions to named parameters with types (float/int), valid ranges, units (mm/inch), and default values
Build code assembler (code_gen.py): chain operations into complete CadQuery script with imports, parameter declarations, feature sequence, export call, and provenance comments
Build code validator: verify generated script parses (AST check), executes without error, produces non-zero-volume geometry, and passes manifold check
Test: generate CadQuery code from 3 extracted feature trees, execute, compare output geometry to reference parts
Edge case handling (Opus review): revolved features, linear/circular patterns, mirror operations, multi-body parts, basic assemblies

custom_checks: 3+ generated CadQuery scripts produce valid STEP geometry
All dimensions parameterized with types and ranges
Provenance links to source video present

scrutiny_config.escalation_rule: if pass 4+ finds CRITICAL, flag for human review
